entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -23.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 01:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 80 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
